articles.description: Rhys Williams had been partnered with Virgil van Dijk in the early rounds of this season's Carabao Cup but has now been forced to replace the Dutchman following his serious knee injury at Everton.
articles.content:
Liverpool centre-back Rhys Williams insists he wants to become an invaluable member of the side after making his European bow against Atalanta.
